title: The right side
author: VD
content_html: Looking at these two lists, I’d definitely prefer to be on the side I’m assigned.  I can’t help but notice the supposedly “Insane People” are considerably more successful, accomplished, and better-looking, for the most part, than the “Sane People”.
content_text:
Looking at these two lists, I’d definitely prefer to be on
the side I’m assigned
.  I can’t help but notice the supposedly “Insane People” are considerably more successful, accomplished, and better-looking, for the most part, than the “Sane People”.
